title: The Prism Of Youth: Blame It On The Ghost
overview: Following the success of two feature films adapted from Nguyễn Nhật Ánh's renowned works, another standout masterpiece by Vietnam's most celebrated modern author is set to hit the big screen: Kính Vạn Hoa. Helming this blockbuster project is none other than the "hundred-billion director" Võ Thanh Hòa.
